title: November 1, 2010
content:
Health Updates Medea Benjamin is a co-founder of the anti-war feminist organization Codepink & a co-founder of the... <!--more--> international human rights organization Global Exchange.
  For the past 20 years she has been an advocate for social justice; has diligently fought the World Trade Organization & was responsible for bringing attention to US clothing retailers for capitalizing on sweatshop labor in developing countries.
Discussing the failure of Jon Stewart’s Restore Sanity rally; the silencing of the anti-war movement.
www.codepink4peace.org/
